recipe.title: Gin Rickeys
ingredients: 6 to 8 oz chilled club soda or seltzer
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with cracked ice, then add gin and lime juice. Shake 5 seconds, then strain into 2 tall (8- to 10-ounce) glasses filled with ice cubes. Top off drinks with club soda, then squeeze a lime wedge over each and drop into glass.
